Title: Meet Waluscha de Sousa who starred opposite Shah Rukh Khan in Fan
Content: Waluscha de Sousa was 18 years old when she first starred in a short commercial with Shah Rukh Khan. At 31, she starred as lead actress opposite him in Fan, a Bollywood thriller which released earlie
